snippet.title: Hook Line & Sniper | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Hook Line & Sniper leaps out of water on March 7th through Steam and Itch.io! Wishlist on Steam Here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3143190/Hook_Line_and_Sniper/

You are a fish. Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper!

In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style.

Unlock new weapons and fish skins, encounter new enemies and environments, and prove once and for all who's the REAL apex predator! 

---------------------------------------
🎣 Visit our Steam page Here 🎣 : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3143190/Hook_Line_and_Sniper/

🎣 Check out our Itch.io page Here 🎣 : https://itella-itella.itch.io

Follow our Socials
X/Twitter | https://twitter.com/Itella_Itella/
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/itella_itella/
TikTok | https://www.tiktok.com/@itellaitella

#indiegame #indiedev #gaming #steam
